بسم الله 
الحمد لله تم الانتهاء من برنامج عملت علية طويلا لتطوير عملى وذيادة الانتاجية فى تخصصى SharePoint Development & Administration
واحب اشاركو هذا البرنامج الذى امل ان يكون مفيد لأصدقائى المطورين ومتخصصى التقنية .
البرنامج ماذال فى طور الاختبار وهيا نسخة تجريبية للمستخدم .

posts.message:
I've seen people make lots of mistakes, like using symmetric encryption algorithm on passwords.

If you don't know what wrong with the above, then you need to watch this session.

Every programmer must know the basics of cryptography. No excuse!
posts.caption: youtube.com
posts.description: Laurens Van Houtven An introduction to applied cryptography and information security suitable for programmers of all ages and skill levels.

posts.message:
I'm a web developer who works mainly on PHP projects. I'm gonna have a lot of spare time ahead and I want to learn a new language or improve myself in the ones i know, Could you suggest me what to do ? Here's what's in my head:

1. Learn JavaScript design patterns
2. Learn Python then Django (I have a background in Python)
3. Learn C++ (I had a background a while ago)
4. ?

و احنا حنساعدك في الباقي
